name: nanogallery
description: Image gallery simplified. Very easy to implement image gallery plugin for jQuery. It is touch enabled, responsive, fast and it supports cloud storage. Featuring multi-level navigation in albums, lightbox, combinable hover effects on thumbnails, slideshow, fullscreen, pagination, image lazy load, themes, deep linking, browser back/forward navigation, i18n, and pulling in Flickr/Picasa/Google+/smugmug photo albums among others.
